name: Greek Squash Salad
description: Prep ahead and refrigerate dressing in the Cruet; it will keep well up to one week. Save prep time and buy pre-chopped squash cubes. You can find them in the fresh produce section of most grocery stores. Great make-ahead lunch salad: layer in a mason jar; put greens on top so they don’t wilt; dress just before eating.

ingredients.name: low-sodium white kidney or cannellini beans

preparation: In a Cruet, combine dressing mix, oil, and vinegar. Secure lid; shake to mix. Dressing makes about 1 cup.
Place squash in Round or Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high, 6–8 min, or until tender.
Scoop tomatoes from jar; drain and rinse beans.
To serve, place greens in a large salad bowl. Top with warm squash, tomatoes, and beans. Add toppings, if desired. Drizzle with 1⁄2 cup dressing; refrigerate remainder for use another day.
tips: Make it a big bowl dinner and swap some of the beans with cooked chicken, shrimp, beef, or edamame. This is the type of salad that loves leftovers!
Use the oil in the sundried tomato jar to make your dressing—no waste! Simply pour into a measuring cup and top up with olive oil until you get 3⁄4 cup.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
